title: Video: JOY. – Captured
body:
Don’t usually mention the ‘people behind the scenes’ when posting music, but with so many of the artists he works with appearing on these pages recently, it only seems right to shout out Jack Toohey, working with Kailo, Nicole Millar, Aela Kae and the subject of this post, **JOY.**

. As well as managing the aforementioned, he only [contributes visually](http://www.jacktoohey.com/) to several different projects, and takes some pretty awesome shots, really adding an extra dimension to the music he works with. In the case of JOY. and her fantastic debut single _Captured_, he really helps it stand out from the crowd with this vibrant, rooftop filmed video, accompanying the Lorde-esque drawl of Olivia McCarthy. It’s only a matter of time before Toohey has a bonafide hit, and judging by the strength of Captured, it could well come courtesy of JOY. Check it out below.
